item.title: Trump says Princeton student Elizabeth Tsurkov freed after being held by Hezbollah for 2 years
item.description: President Donald Trump announces Princeton student Elizabeth Tsurkov has been released by Hezbollah and is now safe at the American Embassy in Iraq.

item.title: Jury pool shrinks as Ryan Routh trial unfolds in Florida on Day 2
item.description: Judge Aileen Cannon removed potential jurors for Ryan Routh's assassination attempt trial, including a woman who declared herself 'MAGA.'
